typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as double,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HospitalSource
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CountryLookUP
HospitalSource select(mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		reported_date = date,
		reported_year_week = year_week,
		value,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOnlyRequired
SelectOnlyRequired, CountryLookUP lookup(SelectOnlyRequired@country == CountryLookUP@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountryCode
LookupCountryCode select(mapColumn(
		country = SelectOnlyRequired@country,
		indicator,
		reported_date,
		reported_year_week,
		value,
		source,
		country = CountryLookUP@country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFieldsRequired
SelectFieldsRequired split(indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k' ,
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitDailyFromWeekly@(Weekly, Daily)
